name: Opus Gloves
description:
Give any outfit that final elegant touch with the Opus opera gloves from Dyna Lei. Contrasting black velvet and rich leather impeccably trimmed with gold satin to create an understated impact that's sure to liven any evening.
Men sizes are currently unavailable.
description_cn:
戴上戴娜·蕾设计的奥普斯长手套，为任何服装添上最后一笔优雅之触。对比鲜明的黑色天鹅绒和富丽堂皇的皮革完美地饰以金色缎面，营造出低调的冲击力，确保在任何夜晚都光彩照人。
目前暂无男款。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-Aparelli_NewBabbage
